titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Brocket Hall, before the right vvorshipfull, Sir Iohn Brocket, and other gentlemen there assembled for the trayning of souldiers
Sermon preached at Brocket Hall, before the right worshipfull, Sir John Brocket, and other gentlemen there assembled for the trayning of souldiers.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Edward, fl.1587-1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Orwin, for Iohn Daldern and William Haw,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
